means: [史](1861年美国南方十一州的)脱离联邦

sentence.Network_en: South Carolina passed an " ordinance of secession ", and prepared for war.
sentence.Network_cn: 南卡罗来纳州通过了 “ 脱离联邦法令 ”, 准备打仗.

sentence.Network_en: Of this nature appears to be the assumed right of secession.
sentence.Network_cn: 擅自的退出权即属于此一性质.

sentence.Network_en: This, they feel, may lay the groundwork for financial independence and secession.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们觉得, 如此可以打下财政独立与成功的基础.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...un)说服最热切而激进的关税反对者采纳拒行联邦法规(nullification)的宗旨作为应对策略，而非进行实质性脱离(secession)。新一届的南卡罗莱那州议会迅即召集议员当选人召开州内会议。会议中表决通过宣布1828年与1832年的.
secession 一字不仅含有“退出”、“脱离”之意,还有“叛国”之嫌。1860 年爆发于美国的南北战争,其起因便是南部11 州宣布脱离联邦(secession)。想当年,标榜崇尚.

list.abs: 杰克森在任期间另一件引人注意的危机为1828年至1832年的“拒行联邦法规危机”，或称“分离危机”(secession crisis)，为因贸易关税而起的区域性冲突。批评者声称，对自欧洲进口的一般制品课征高关税（“令人嫌恶的关税”），.
the issue of the national secession Tay Nguyen ( the Central Highlands ) is the most serious one among the three problems concerning national secession in Vietnam .越南西原的民族分裂问题是越南三大民族分裂问题中最严重的一个。
on national secession in tay nguyen , vietnam ., 越南西原地区民族分离主义问题研究.
board to take up secession plan ., 董事会采取了分裂国家计划.
on secession right of international law ., 论国际法上的分离权.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (denoting the withdrawal of plebeians from ancient Rome in order to compel the patricians to redress their grievances): from French sécession or Latin secessio(n-), from secedere 'go apart' (see secede)

entry.tran: (从国家、大集团的)退出，脱离，分离
entry.def: The secession of a region or group from the country or larger group to which it belongs is the action of formally becoming separate.

example.ex: ...the Ukraine's secession from the Soviet Union.

means.word_mean: 1. an Austrian school of art and architecture parallel to the French art nouveau in the 1890s
2. formal separation from an alliance or federation
